Verses: 1 pavul Aalosanai Sangaththaarai Utruppaarththu: Sagodharare Innaal Varaikkum Ellaa Vishayangalilum Naan Nalmanachsaatchiyode Dhevanukkumunbaaga Nadandhuvandhen Endru Sonnaan.
2 appozhudhu Piradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Ananiyaa Avanukkuch Sameebamaai Nindravargalai Nokki: Ivan Vaayil Adiyungal Endru Kattalaiyittaan.

3 appozhudhu Pavul Avanaipparththu: Vellaiyadikkappatta Suvare, Dhevan Ummai Adippaar; Niyaayappiramaanaththinpadi Ennai Niyaayam Visaarikkiravaraai Utkaarndhirukkira Neer Niyaayappiramaanaththirku Virodhamaai Ennai Adikkach Sollalaamaa Endraan.
4 sameebaththile Nindravargal: Dhevanudaiya Piradhaana Aasaariyarai Vaigiraayaa Endraargal.
5 adharkup Pavul: Sagodharare, Ivar Piradhaana Aasaariyarendru Enakkuth Theriyaadhu; Un Janaththin Adhibadhiyaith Theedhu Sollaayaaga Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe Endraan.

6 pinbu Avargalil, Sadhuseyar Orupangum Pariseyar Oru Pangumaayirukkiraargalendru Pavul Arindhu: Sagodharare, Naan Pariseyanum Pariseyanudaiya Maganumaayirukkiren. Mariththorudaiya Uyirdhezhudhalaippatriya Nambikkaiyaik Kuriththu Naan Niyaayam Visaarikkappadugiren Endru Aalosanaich Sangaththile Saththamittuch Sonnaan.
7 avan Ippadich Sonnabodhu, Pariseyarukkum Sadhuseyarukkum Vaakkuvaadhamundaayitru; Koottam Irandaagap Pirindhadhu.
8 ennaththinaalendraal, Sadhuseyar Uyirththezhudhal Illaiyendrum, Dhevadhoodhanum Aaviyum Illaiyendrum Sollugiraargal. Pariseyaro Avvirandum Undendru Oppukkollugiraargal.

9 aagaiyaal Migundha Kookkural Undaayitru. Pariseya Samayaththaaraana Vedhapaaragaril Silar Ezhundhu: Indha Manushanidaththil Oru Pollaangaiyum Kaanom; Oru Aavi Alladhu Oru Dhevadhoodhan Ivanudane Pesinadhundaanaal, Naam Dhevanudane Porseyvadhu Thagaadhu Endru Vaadhaadinaargal.
10 migundha Kalagam Undaanabodhu, Pavul Avargalaal Peerundupovaanendru Senaabadhi Bayandhu, Porchchevagar Poi, Avanai Avargal Naduvilirundhu Izhuththuk Kottaikkuk Kondupogumpadi Kattalaiyittaan.
11 andru Raaththiriyile Karththar Pavulin Aruge Nindru: Pavule, Thidankol; Nee Ennaikkuriththu Erusalemil Saatchikoduththadhupola Romaavilum Saatchikodukkavendum Endraar.
12 vidiyarkaalamaanabodhu, Yoodharil Silar Orumiththu, Thaangal Pavulaik Kolaiseyyumalavum Pusippadhumillai Kudippadhumillaiyendru Sabadhampannikkondaargal.
13 ippadik Kattuppaadu Pannikkondavargal Naarpadhuperukku Adhigamaayirundhaargal.
14 avargal Piradhaana Aasaariyargalidaththilum Mooppargalidaththilum Poi: Naangal Pavulaik Kolaiseyyumalavum Ondrum Pusippadhillaiyendru Urudhiyaana Sabadhampannikkondom.

15 aanapadiyinaal Neengal Aalosanai Sangaththaarode Koodappoi, Avanudaiya Kaariyaththai Adhiga Thittamaai Visaarikka Manadhullavargalpolach Senaabadhikkuk Kaanbiththu, Avar Naalaikku Avanai Ungalidaththil Koottikkonduvarumpadi Avaridaththil Ketpeergalaaga. Avan Kittavarugiradharkulle Naangal Avanaik Kolaiseyya Aayaththamaayiruppom Endraargal.
16 indhach Sarppanaiyaip Pavulinudaiya Sagodhariyin Kumaaran Kelvippattu, Kottaikkulle Poi, Pavulukku Ariviththaan.
17 appozhudhu Pavul Nootrukku Adhibadhigalil Oruvanai Azhaiththu, Indha Vaalibanaich Senaabadhiyinidaththirkuk Koottikkondupom; Avaridaththil Ivan Arivikkavendiya Oru Kaariyamundu Endraan.

18 andhappadiye Avan Ivanaich Senaabadhiyinidaththirkuk Koottikkondupoi: Kaavalil Vaikkappattirukkira Pavul Ennai Azhaiththu, Umakkoru Kaariyaththaich Sollavendumendrirukkira Indha Vaalibanai Ummidaththirkuk Kondupogumpadi Ennaik Kettukkondaan Endraan.
19 appozhudhu Senaabadhi Avanudaiya Kaiyaip Pidiththuth Thaniye Azhaiththukkondupoi: Nee Ennidaththil Arivikkavendiya Kaariyam Ennavendru Kettaan.

20 adharku Avan: Yoodhargal Pavulin Kaariyaththai Adhiga Thittamaai Visaarikkamanadhullavargalpola, Neer Naalaikku Avanai Aalosanai Sangaththaaridaththil Konduvarumpadi Ummai Vendikkolla Udanpattirukkiraargal.

21 neer Avargalukkuch Sammadhikkavendaam; Avargalil Naarpadhuperkku Adhigamaanavargal Avanaik Kolaiseyyumalavum Thaangal Pusippadhumillai Kudippadhumillaiyendru Sabadhampannikkondu, Avanukkup Padhivirundhu, Ummudaiya Uththaravukkaaga Ippozhudhu Kaaththukkondu Aayaththamaayirukkiraargal Endraan.
22 appozhudhu Senaapadhi: Nee Ivaigalai Enakku Ariviththadhaaga Oruvarukkunj Sollaadhe Endru Kattalaiyittu, Vaalibanai Anuppivittaan.

23 pinbu Avan Nootrukku Adhibadhigalil Iranduperai Azhaiththu, Sesariyaapattanaththirkup Pogumpadi Irunooru Kaalaatkalaiyum, Ezhubadhu Kudhiraiveeraraiyum, Irunooru Eettikkaararaiyum, Raaththiriyil Moondraammani Velaiyile, Aayaththampannungalendrum;
24 pavulai Etri, Dhesaadhibadhiyaagiya Peliksinidaththirkup Paththiramaaik Kondupogumpadikkuk Kudhiraigalai Aayaththappaduththungalendrum Sonnadhumandri,
25 oru Nirubaththaiyum Ezhudhinaan; Adhin Vivaramaavadhu:
26 ganamporundhiya Dhesaadhibadhiyaagiya Peliks Enbavarukkuk Kilavudhiyu Leesiyaa Vaazhththudhal Solli Arivikkiradhu Ennavendraal:
27 indha Manushanai Yoodhar Pidiththukkolaiseyyappogira Samayaththil, Naan Porchsevagarode Koodappoi, Ivan Romanendru Arindhu, Ivanai Viduviththen.
28 avargal Ivanmel Saattina Kutraththai Naan Ariyavendumendru Ivanai Avargal Aalosanai Sangaththukkumun Konduponen.

29 ivan Avargaludaiya Vedhaththirkaduththa Vishayangalaikkuriththuk Kutranjsaattappattavanendru Vilanginadheyallaamal, Maranaththukkaavadhu Vilangukkaavadhu Etra Kutram Yaadhondrum Ivanidaththil Illaiyendru Kandarindhen.

30 yoodhargal Ivanukku Virodhamaaich Sarppanaiyaana Yosanai Seygiraargalendru Enakkuth Theriyavandhabodhu, Udane Ivanai Ummidaththirku Anuppinen; Kutranjaattugiravargalum Ivanukku Virodhamaaich Sollugira Kaariyangalai Umakku Munbaaga Vandhu Sollumpadi Avargalukkuk Kattalaiyitten. Sugamaayiruppeeraaga, Endrezhudhinaan.
31 porchsevagar Thangalukkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Pavulaik Koottikkondu, Raaththiriyile Andhippaththiri Oorukkup Poi,
32 marunaalil Kudhiraiveerarai Avanudanekoodap Pogumpadi Anuppivittu, Thaangal Kottaikkuth Thirumbinaargal.
33 avargal Sesariyaapattanaththil Serndhu, Nirubaththaith Dhesaadhibadhiyinidaththil Koduththu, Pavulaiyum Avanmunbaaga Niruththinaargal,
34 dhesaadhibadhi Adhai Vaasiththu: Endha Naattaanendru Kettu, Silisiyaa Naattaanendru Arindhabodhu:
35 unmel Kutranjaattugiravargalum Vandhirukkumbodhu Un Kaariyaththaith Thittamaaik Ketpenendru Solli, Erodhin Aramanaiyile Avanaik Kaavalpannumpadi Kattalaiyittaan.
